message.content: {"given_definition_quality":38,"better_definition":"to move; to change position","sentence":"小学生走路动。","image_prompt":"A group of primary school children walking along a road, their bodies slightly in motion, showing clear movement. The scene is peaceful but the sky and surrounding area have a gentle, surreal soft apocalypse feel—subtle glows, slightly altered natural colors, a dreamy animation style. The children are happy and the sense of motion is clear and gentle.","sentence_translation":"Primary school students move by walking."}
